title: Marigold in 4 Minutes
overview: Mikoto is an orderly in the emergency ward of a hospital. He has an extraordinary ability. He can see the time of death of someone should he touch that person. He is in love with his older step-sister and so he touches her. At that moment he knows her destiny is to die in a mere one year. He cannot do much about fate. What he determines to do, however, is to make her last year on earth a happy one full of love, affection and good times.
